name: <(ops::range::Bound<usize>, ops::range::Bound<usize>) as slice::index::SliceIndex<[T]>>::index_mut

slice::index::into_slice_range.doc:
Converts pair of `ops::Bound`s into `ops::Range`.
 Panics on overflowing indices.

slice::index::SliceIndex::index_mut.doc:
Returns a mutable reference to the output at this location, panicking
 if out of bounds.
